transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hanji boliye.
Customer: Hello sir, good evening.
Executive: Tension friend. Ji sir, good evening.
Customer: Javed ji bol rahe hain na sir, C trailer se.
Executive: Washer aur headlock.
Customer: Han sir, main Manish bol. Hello.
Executive: Ji boliye.
Customer: Han sir, main Manish bol raha tha sir, aapka account manager sir India Mart head office se sir.
Executive: Ji ji boliye.
Customer: Han sir, sir kaise chal rahi hai sir ye Mart ki aapke sath?
Executive: Sir actually main unka beta bol raha hu Javed bhai ka aur main hi dekhta hu first of all jo bhi services hai meri abhi thodi health ka issue tha to main abhi bilkul bhi dhyan nahi de pa raha tha.
Executive: Han han.
Customer: Han. But abhi agle week se main isme thoda sa active rehta hu.
Executive: Han. Theek hai sir. Sir isliye call kiya tha actually mujhe aapke catalog ka sir pricing rate nahi kari hai aapne products ke sath aapne main dekh raha hu aapke product hai na abhi.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Aapke abhi active product hai wo aapke 21 product abhi active hai na sir. Ji ji.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Han jisme aapka ek button hole machine hai sir iska sir correct price kitna hai sir? Button hole machine ka.
Executive: 90000.
Executive: Kitna sir? 90000.
Executive: Han.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai sir ye maine update kar diya ek aur aapka sir product hai Zupi DDL triple 5093 machine.
Customer: 23500.
Executive: 23500. 23500 sir. 23500 ha.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Grease oil wagera le sir.
Customer: Han. Theek hai sir ek aur sir aapka hai ye product umbrella swing machine shuttle hook umbrella swing 9200.
Customer: 9200 sir umbrella shuttle hook.
Customer: Han shuttle hook kitna price hai uska? Uska to 350.
Executive: 350 hai theek hai sir.
Customer: Sir aap is cheez ko baad me discuss kare kya free of mind main abhi therapy ke liye ja raha hu.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai to aap kal aap kal free rahenge sir? Nahi ha kal aap ek bar contact kijiye.
Executive: Ha to morning me call karunga main aapko theek hai sir. Aap mujhe 1 baje ke baad call karna.
Executive: 1 baje ke baad sir. Ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai main kal call karunga. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Pricing rate not done for catalog products.

- Wants to discuss later due to therapy.



Resolution:

- Executive updated the prices of products.

- Agreed to call the customer the next day.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- pricing, catalog, products, follow up
